boardgame.name: Guillotine
斷頭台
boardgame.description: The French Revolution is famous in part for the use of the guillotine to put nobles to death, and this is the macabre subject of this light card game. As executioners pandering to the masses, the players are trying to behead the least popular nobles. Each day the nobles are lined up and players take turns killing the ones at the front of the line until all the nobles are gone. However, players are given cards which will manipulate the line order right before 'harvesting,' which is what makes the game interesting. After three days worth of chopping, the highest total carries the day._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

All our games are brand new in shrink wrap. Buyer pays for shipping. Shipping will depend on your location and the weight of game. We will discount shipping on multiple games orders whenever possible to ensure the fairest rate. We are not responsible for lost mail but will insure shipment, at your request. Items are shipped within one business day of receiving payment. Payment must be recieved within 7 days after the day you agreed to buy the item, and all PayPal or credit card payments must be made within this time period. If payment isn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t received within these time periods, all orders will be revoked and proper feedback will be left. Unopened merchandise may be returned within 14 days of purchase for a full refund, less original shipping charges. Return shipping charges are the responsibility of the customer with the exception of defective merchandise. To return an item, please contact us prior to sending an item back to us. WA orders pay 8.5% sales tax. Please email us with any questions. Thanks Chum Chum Games customerservice@chumchumgames.com

never played +++++ german rules, but game parts are almost language independent and you can download various rules translations from boardgamegeek +++++ will be shipped with insurance +++++ payment for usa, canada, asia or australia : paypal or cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for other non-euro-countries : cash (by letter, exchanged already into euros) or bank transfer +++++ payment for european countries, that have euro : cash (by letter) or bank transfer (wich by the way is cost-free !) +++++ payment for germany : personal pick up in berlin or bank transfer +++++ foreign buyers beware : german postal sadly is very expensive for foreign packages (about 18 - 45 euros, it depends on, where the package has to be shipped and the weight), pleask at for shipping prices, before you buy !) +++++ shipping inside germany will cost 8 euros, including insurance

Wizards of the Coast edition. Well played but cards are in excellent condition.

Wizards of the Coast 2005 Edition (WOC06400) The revolutionary card game where you win by getting a head! This irreverent and humorous card game takes place during the French Revolution. Players represent rival guillotine operators vying for the best collection of noble heads over three rounds. You want top bragging rights, so you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;d better collect the most prestigious noggins. Will you be skillful enough to bribe the guards and collect Marie Antoinette? Or will you lose points for beheading the Hero of the People?

This game I bought actually long time ago. I played it around maybe 20 times, the outside box show lots of wear and tear but the content inside are in good condition. The first time you play this game is the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;learning period_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; cuz you gotta read every single card to find out that each card do. But the 2nd time around you should able to fly through a game or 2 with a breeze. You know, my experience with games has grow over times. I am getting to know what kind of game I am into and what kinda game I am not. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s like you pick a broad direction at first and then keep refining your like and niches until you reach the kind of game you truly like to play. Guillotine is a part of this process and unfortunately it doesn_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t align with my current interest anymore so I had to let it go. Yes, I am letting you have it...for a fee of course. U.S. Shipping is $3.99 by USPS, local pickup is available as well so you save the shipping fee. I live in Queens zip 11364. I take Paypal, Money Order and Checks. Let me know if you got any questions. Thanks for visiting. Jay Huang 917-930-8749 cthuang22 at yahoo dot com

New/sealed item! Fast shipping! Pay via paypal to maydaygames@gmail.com. Buyer to pay just $4.95 shipping! YES THIS ITEM IS SMALL ENOUGH TO QUALIFY FOR INTERNATIONAL WORLDWIDE SHIPPING FOR JUST $9.95! Yes we can combine orders at significant shipping discounts. Please paypal payments to maydaygames@gmail.com. Be SURE you include what item you are buying with the payment. Combined shipping works as follows for domestic (48 lower states) orders: Highest price shipping item: Full shipping cost 2nd-4th highest priced items: 50% off shipping cost for each of these items. 5th-10th highest priced shipping items: 60% off shipping costs for each of these items. 11th+ highest priced shipping items: 75% off shipping for all the rest of the items. As an example say you purchased 15 games, 3 of them with $10 shipping, 5 of them with $8 shipping and 7 of them with $4 shipping. The total shipping for the 15 items would be: Full shipping on the first item: $10.00 50% off shipping on items 2-4: $14.00 (50% off $10, $10 and $8, the next highest shipping cost items) 60% off shipping on items 5-10: $14.40 (60% off of 3 items at $8 shipping and 3 more items at $4 shipping = $36) 75% off shipping on items 11-15: $4.00 (75% off 4 items at $4) Total shipping on these 15 items then would be $10+$14+$14.40 + $4 = $42.40 shipping. This is just an example and your results will vary depending on what you buy of course!

German edition, played once but despite that in perfect condition. --++ General Information ++-- The item comes from a private collection (non-smoking). I use the austrian federal postal service (usually the cheapest option). Estimated shipping costs within EU: Up to 1kg without insurance: € 14,- Up to 2kg with insurance: € 15,- Up to 5kg with insurance: € 18,- Shipping costs to destinations outside of the EU vary. --++ Payment ++-- I prefer bank transfer (IBAN/BIC) because it is fast and causes no fees. PayPal is also possible but discouraged.
